input: I can't make calls from my cell phone, but I can receive them.
target: Please check your account balance and top up if necessary.

input: My smartphone won't connect to the 4G network.
target: Go to Settings > Network & Internet > Mobile network and ensure 4G is enabled.

input: My monthly bill is much higher than usual.
target: I'll review your account. Please provide your account number.

input: I can't access my work email on my phone.
target: Check your email app settings and ensure your password is correct.

input: My new smartphone doesn't recognize the SIM card.
target: Remove and reinsert the SIM card. If it persists, you may need a new SIM.

input: I keep experiencing call drops in a specific area.
target: Provide the location. I'll check for network issues in that area.

input: I can't activate international roaming on my account.
target: Let's verify if your plan supports roaming. What's your phone number?

input: I'm not receiving SMS from service numbers.
target: Check your messaging app settings for any blocked numbers.

input: How do I set up a Wi-Fi hotspot on my smartphone?
target: What's your phone model? I'll provide specific instructions for your device.

input: I think my number has been cloned. I'm receiving unauthorized calls and SMS.
target: We'll block your SIM immediately. Please confirm your identity for security.

input: My voicemail isn't working. Callers can't leave messages.
target: Try calling your own number to access voicemail. If issues persist, we'll reset it.

input: I want to switch to a different data plan.
target: What's your current data usage? I'll recommend suitable plans.

input: My phone is showing 'No Service' and I can't connect to any network.
target: Restart your phone. If it doesn't work, provide your location to check for outages.

input: I've lost my phone. How do I prevent unauthorized usage?
target: I'll help you remotely lock your device and suspend service. Verify your identity first.

input: How do I set up visual voicemail on my new iPhone?
target: Provide your phone number. I'll check if your plan supports it and guide you.

input: I'm moving to a new address. Will my service be affected?
target: Give me your new address. I'll check coverage and update your information.

input: My data speed seems slower than usual. Is there a problem with the network?
target: What's your location? I'll check for network issues in your area.

input: I've exceeded my data limit. How can I add more data to my plan this month?
target: I'll check available data add-ons. What's your account number?

input: How do I block unwanted calls and text messages?
target: What's your phone model? I'll provide specific blocking instructions.

input: I'm having trouble setting up my APN settings for mobile data.
target: What's your phone model? I'll give you the correct APN settings.

input: My phone keeps restarting randomly.
target: Update your phone's software. If it persists, we may need to check for hardware issues.

input: I can't send picture messages (MMS).
target: Ensure mobile data is on and check your APN settings.

input: How do I activate Wi-Fi calling?
target: What's your device model? I'll guide you through the Wi-Fi calling setup.

input: I'm getting spam calls constantly.
target: I can help you activate our spam filter service. Provide your account number.

input: My phone shows 'SIM card registration failed'.
target: Your SIM may need to be replaced. Visit our nearest store with ID.

input: I need to change my phone number.
target: I can assist with that. Are you looking for a specific number or any available one?

input: How do I set up parental controls on my child's phone?
target: What's the device model? I'll provide instructions for parental control setup.

input: My data usage seems incorrect on my bill.
target: I'll review your data usage. Please provide your account number.

input: I can't make video calls.
target: Ensure you have a strong data connection and the latest app version installed.

input: How do I transfer my number to a new provider?
target: I can start the porting process. Please confirm you want to leave our service.

input: My phone is locked to another carrier.
target: Provide your IMEI number. I'll check if we can unlock it.

input: I need a copy of my past bills.
target: How many months of bills do you need? I'll email them to you.

input: My phone is heating up excessively.
target: Close unnecessary apps and avoid charging while using. If it persists, it may need repair.

input: I'm not receiving OTP for online transactions.
target: Check if you've blocked short codes. I can help unblock them if needed.

input: How do I set up eSIM on my device?
target: What's your device model? I'll provide specific eSIM setup instructions.

input: I want to add a new line to my account.
target: I can help with that. Do you need a new number or want to port an existing one?

input: My phone's battery is draining very quickly.
target: Check which apps are using most battery. Consider replacing the battery if it's old.

input: I can't connect to Wi-Fi calling.
target: Ensure Wi-Fi calling is enabled in your phone settings and you have a strong Wi-Fi signal.

input: How do I update my payment method?
target: I can guide you through updating your payment info. What's your account number?

input: I'm traveling abroad. How do I use my phone there?
target: Where are you traveling? I'll check our international plans for that location.

input: My voicemail greeting isn't working.
target: I can help you reset your voicemail greeting. What's your phone number?

input: I need to block international calls.
target: I can add an international call block to your account. Please confirm your phone number.

input: How do I check my remaining data allowance?
target: You can check via our mobile app or by dialing *data#. Which method do you prefer?

input: I'm getting calls from my own number.
target: This is likely a spam tactic. I'll help you report and block these calls.

input: My phone won't charge.
target: Try a different charger and cable. If it persists, you may need hardware repair.

input: I need to suspend my service temporarily.
target: I can help with a temporary suspension. How long do you need it suspended?

input: How do I set up call forwarding?
target: I'll guide you through call forwarding setup. What number do you want to forward to?

input: I can't hear the other person during calls.
target: Check your phone's volume and speaker. If issues persist, we may need to repair it.

input: How do I opt out of marketing messages?
target: I can update your preferences to opt out. Please confirm your account number.

input: My phone is stuck in 'Emergency calls only' mode.
target: Try restarting your phone and checking for network outages in your area.
